articles.headline: Bitcoin Is Starting to Look Like a Digital Tulip
articles.description: It’s been a tough few weeks for holders of Bitcoin. Not long ago you could, with a little effort, make a reasonable case that it was a bit like gold. Digital gold.

articles.headline: ChatGPT Thinks Bitcoin Will Close At This Level By The End of 2025
articles.description: Bitcoin is starting December on weaker footing as risk assets wobble and the year-end rally narrative gives way to a market working through heavy volatility. BTC has fallen into the mid-$80,000s after trading above $125,000 in early October, leaving ...

articles.headline: Indiana Bill Would Mandate Bitcoin in Pensions and Shield Self-Custody Rights
articles.description: A newly introduced bill in Indiana would require public retirement programs to offer Bitcoin-related investment options and would also limit how much power local governments have to restrict the use of digital assets.The proposal was filed on Thursday by State Representative Kyle Pierce, a Republican from Anderson. Known as House ...

articles.headline: Strategy CEO Says $1.44B Cash Reserve Aims to Calm Bitcoin-Slump Fears
articles.description: Strategy CEO Phong Le says the company’s newly built $1.44 billion cash reserve is designed to quiet investor anxiety over its ability to withstand a sharp downturn in Bitcoin. Key Takeaways: Strategy built a $1.44B cash reserve to ease investor fears about its ability to meet dividend and debt obligations. ...

articles.headline: Bitcoin has plunged. Strategy Inc is an early victim
Why Michael Saylor's Strategy could hold the key for the whole bitcoin market
articles.description: Strategy can likely avoid forced sales of its bitcoins if its keeps the its enterprise value to cryptocurrency holdings ratio above 1.0, per JPMorgan analysts.

articles.headline: Jim Cramer Notes Strategy’s Transformation into a “Bitcoin Accumulation Machine Fueled by Borrowed Money”
articles.description: Strategy Inc (NASDAQ:MSTR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. Cramer mentioned the stock during the episode and said: “In this business, nothing’s harder than spotting bottoms… What matters the most here is not Bitcoin itself, but a company called Strategy run by Michael Saylor, a Bitcoin evangelist who’s adopted what I […]

articles.headline: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Dive as Liquidations Hit $500 Million—While Stocks Rise
articles.description: Bitcoin is back below the $90,000 mark as Ethereum flirts with another dip below $3,000—all while major stock indices stay green.

articles.headline: Bitcoin is down nearly 30% from its record high — history shows that's normal
articles.description: In the 2021 and 2017 bitcoin cycles, there were a number of instances of drops of 30% or bigger.

articles.headline: Why Did Bitcoin Drop Below $90,000 Again? A Breakdown of the Latest Sell-Off
articles.description: Bitcoin falls below $90,000 again as liquidations, weak ETF flows, macro pressure and PCE inflation data shape market sentiment.
